sqlList.sql: update t_lm_hotel_ex set LINKMAN=:LINKMAN,LINKTEL=:LINKTEL,LINKMAIL=:LINKMAIL,LINKFAX=:LINKFAX,REMARK=:REMARK,EX_TIME=:EXTIME,EX_MODE=:EXMODE,UPDATE_TIME=SYSDATE,UPDATE_USER=:UPDATEUSER,STATUS=:STATUS where HOTEL_ID=:HOTELID and TYPE=:TYPE

merge into t_lm_hotel_ex t1 using (select :HOTELID AS HOTEL_ID, :TYPE AS TYPE ,:LINKMAN AS LINKMAN,:LINKTEL AS LINKTEL,:LINKMAIL AS LINKMAIL, :LINKFAX AS LINKFAX, :REMARK AS REMARK, :EXTIME AS EX_TIME, :EXMODE AS EX_MODE, :STATUS AS STATUS, :CREATEUSER AS CREATE_USER from dual) t2 on (t1.HOTEL_ID = t2.HOTEL_ID and t1.TYPE = t2.TYPE) when matched then update set t1.LINKMAN=t2.LINKMAN,t1.LINKTEL=t2.LINKTEL,t1.LINKMAIL=t2.LINKMAIL,t1.LINKFAX=t2.LINKFAX,t1.REMARK=t2.REMARK, t1.EX_TIME=t2.EX_TIME,t1.EX_MODE=t2.EX_MODE,t1.UPDATE_TIME=sysdate, t1.UPDATE_USER=t2.CREATE_USER where t1.HOTEL_ID = t2.HOTEL_ID and t1.TYPE = t2.TYPE when not matched then insert values (:HOTELID,:TYPE,:LINKMAN,:LINKTEL,:LINKMAIL,:LINKFAX,:REMARK,:EXTIME,:EXMODE,sysdate,sysdate,:CREATEUSER,:CREATEUSER,:STATUS, '', '', '', '')
update t_lm_hotel_ex set REMARK=:REMARK,LINKMAN=:LINKMAN,LINKTEL=:LINKTEL,UPDATE_TIME=SYSDATE,UPDATE_USER=:UPDATEUSER where HOTEL_ID=:HOTELID and TYPE=:TYPE
